patthana9.1:0.3_0: These are the marks of the skillful.

patthana9.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
patthana9.1:10.1_7: (This should be expanded in detail as in the previous discourse.)
patthana9.1:11.1_0: doesn’t for the sake of unskillful qualities, nor for the sake of the skillful.
patthana9.1:11.1_2: Not knowing this, the cause or condition for the reason why the skillful teaching arises.
patthana9.1:11.1_3: Not seeing the cause or reason for the sake of unskillful qualities, nor are causes and reasons.
patthana9.1:12.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the unskillful.
patthana9.1:12.1_1: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
patthana9.1:12.1_2: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful and not skillful qualities.
patthana9.1:13.1_0: No causes the reason for the sake of doing unskillful and skillful quality.
patthana9.1:13.1_1: No cause or reason for the sake of doing unskillful and skillful quality.
patthana9.1:13.1_2: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful and not for the sake of cause or reason.
patthana9.1:14.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
patthana9.1:15.1_0: Not for the sake of determination of any unskillful phenomena to arise by one: two, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, a hundred thousand rebirths.
patthana9.1:15.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the sake of deterioration that gives rise to a cause.
patthana9.1:15.1_2: No matter due to for the sake of debates, nor because of contempt.
patthana9.1:16.1_0: Nor does she have no declared: ‘This is for the sake of deterioration.’ ...
patthana9.1:17.1_0: No cause or reason for the sake of declaring whether or not, nor for the sake of winning debates.
patthana9.1:17.1_1: Not because of the sake of deceiveness and because of contemptuousness, nor because of past insanity, the teaching arises.
patthana9.1:17.1_2: No cause or reason for the sake of decoration, nor because of ill will for the sake of confusion.
patthana9.1:18.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
patthana9.1:2.1_0: Not because of the teaching, unskillful phenomena don’t arise: for the sake of unskillful phenomena, or for one that arises conditioned by mind.
patthana9.1:2.1_1: Not because of the unskillful qualities that arise from the skillful.
patthana9.1:2.1_2: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful and not for the sake of cause or reason.
patthana9.1:3.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the unskillful.
patthana9.1:3.1_1: Not knowing and seeing the teaching of the unskillful, not for the sake of the skillful.
patthana9.1:3.1_2: Nor do they arise because of unskillful qualities.
patthana9.1:4.1_0: No cause or reason for the sake of doing unskillful and skillful qualities.
patthana9.1:4.1_1: No cause or reason for the sake of doing unskillful and skillful quality.
patthana9.1:4.1_2: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful and not for the sake of cause or reason.
patthana9.1:6.1_0: for the sake of investigating, nor for the three supports.
patthana9.1:6.1_1: He should not do three deeds:
patthana9.1:6.1_3: He should not go on a single road before he reaches the Sangha.
patthana9.1:7.1_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana9.1:8.1_0: No cause or reason for the sake of what is the reason why the teaching is not unskillful.
patthana9.1:8.1_1: Not knowing what is the cause or reason for the sake of unskillful qualities that are unskillful.
patthana9.1:8.1_2: Not for the sake of what is not unskillful, nor for the sake of the teaching.
patthana9.1:9.1_0: He doesn’t for the sake of the unskillful.
